players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I find it strange that we lost a player so early in the game. Let's stay focused and work together to figure out who among us might have information we don't have."
You: "I agree with Bob. Let's focus on finding the truth and work together to uncover any crucial information that could help us identify the mafia in our midst."
Diana: "I think we should keep an open mind and not jump to conclusions based on one death. Let's give the new players a chance to prove themselves before we start accusing anyone."

You: "Let's remember that our primary goal is to identify the mafia in our midst and eliminate them. While we should keep an open mind, we cannot ignore the fact that one of us is currently working against us. Based on my investigation during Night 1,..."

Diana: "I understand your concerns, but let's not jump to conclusions based on one event. We should give everyone a fair chance and focus on building trust within our group. As the mafia, I will do my best to blend in and not reveal any suspicious behavior..."

Bob: "Let us not forget that communication and collaboration are key in this game. We have lost a player, but we must stay united and work together to identify the mafia among us. Trust is essential, and we should all make an effort to build it within our group..."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested
